title: Building Firefox on Android from source
UX of animations and transitions in mobile apps.
description: Why do we need animations in mobile applications? What are the principles and advantages? How to do animations and transitions correctly?

title: The Entrepreneurial Journey of Creating a Hardware Startup
description: Entrepreneurship and startup creation is hard. Hardware is even harder as it requires knowledge in a vast variety of domains ranging from software development, electronic development, mechanical development  and marketing  Two entrepreneurs are nevertheless loving this challenge and they are bringing their idea into reality. They have decided to create the next generation of headphones: the Elbee. Join their session to learn how they came up with the idea of creating smart wireless headphones and what they have learned up until now in terms of creating a hardware startup. The product will launch soon on Kickstarter so this is also a great opportunity to get an exclusive look at their product and their story.

title: WebVR Workshop
description: Come experience Virtual Reality, build from scratch your own immersive environment (graphic, sound & interaction) and connect your world to others through the web!

title: Moonshot Sprint
description: Work together with experts and peers to understand and getting closer to a solution for big problems.

title: Learning with Agility
description: Are you ready for efficient and Agile activities with serious learning? Do you want a better capacity to improve your process continuously and quickly? A better team collaboration? Join us to discover and have fun!

title: RealSense SDK
description: Devices with Intel® RealSense™ camera can recognize and respond to facial expressions and hand gestures, so you can interact with them more naturally. In this session you will learn how it works and what the SDK looks like.

title: Storydriven Code
description: Having the user interact is one thing, but it's way more fun when there is a story, a promise behind it. To really propel a user, every program and interface should have this (hidden) meaning. This session includes the meaning of stories behind applications of a wide variety, and how to include them.

title: Introducing Firebase
description: Firebase is a realtime backend service to build realtime softwares in a fraction of the time it used to take. Let see how it works!

title: Understanding React: Learn once, run everywhere
description:
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces that run natively in their environment.
By understanding the main concepts behind React, you will be able to build native applications
on the web and on mobile using the same techniques: Learn once and run everywhere.

title: Eddystone - Beacons
description: Introduction to Eddystone and Google's Becaon platform

title: Polymer & Firebase - Realtime and Web Components Adventures
description: Polymer and Web Components is providing a new way to build web applications. In this talk we'll cover how you store your data, handle user authentication, deploy your app and much more using Polymer Starter Kit and Firebase.
